nodes.text: The Kurual'grast Mountains were located on the planet of Bothawui. Drev'starn, the capital of Bothawui, was located in the foothills of this mountain range, as was the planets largest shield generator. The grandest homes of Drev'starn were located high atop the treacherous cliffs and passes of the mountains. Here the wealthiest clans maintained impressive holdings; some dated back to the earliest times of Bothan civilization.
